tools.name: Tactical Physiological Sigh
tools.action: Grounding: Inhale deeply through nose, add a second short sharp inhale, then a long slow exhale through mouth. Repeat 3 times.

tools.name: Energy Leak Audit
tools.action: Audit: List 5 tasks from your last 48 hours. Label each as 'Charging' (+) or 'Draining' (-). Identify one (-) to delegate or delete.

tools.name: Boundary Drafting
tools.action: Drafting: Write one 'No' script for a recurring work request. Example: 'I can't take that on right now without dropping [Project X]. Which is the priority?'

tools.name: Non-Sleep Deep Rest (NSDR)
tools.action: Output: Set a timer for 10 minutes. Lay flat, eyes closed, focus on slowing your heart rate with belly breathing. No screens.
